1.15.2.1.1.0: Works with all four rail types equally using rails tag.  Added support for redstone dust.  New config for range limit on rail building.  Changed config and jarfile name.
1.15.2.1.2.0: All supported blocks (ladders redstone rails) no longer continue past blocks or empty spaces, needs a clear path to build.
1.15.2.1.2.1: Fixed ladders replacing blocks bug.  Refactored some internals to be more reliable.
